From Out of Nowhere.name: From Out of Nowhere
From Out of Nowhere.fullText:
Drow Wanderer Attack 11From Out of Nowhere

You launch an attack. If your foe doesn’t know you’re there, your blow dazes your enemy for a short time.

Encounter        Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier damage.

Special: If the target grants combat advantage to you, the target is also dazed until the end of your next turn.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 51.
From Out of Nowhere.flavor: You launch an attack. If your foe doesn’t know you’re there, your blow dazes your enemy for a short time.
From Out of Nowhere.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
From Out of Nowhere.onHit: 2[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier damage.
From Out of Nowhere.special: If the target grants combat advantage to you, the target is also dazed until the end of your next turn.

Strength in Darkness.name: Strength in Darkness
Strength in Darkness.fullText:
Drow Wanderer Utility 12Strength in Darkness

The cold embrace of darkness flows into your wounds, replacing your life’s blood with its ebon power.

Daily        Healing
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Spend a healing surge. If you are inside darkness, add your Constitution modifier to the number of hit points you regain.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 51.
Strength in Darkness.flavor: The cold embrace of darkness flows into your wounds, replacing your life’s blood with its ebon power.
Strength in Darkness.effect: Spend a healing surge. If you are inside darkness, add your Constitution modifier to the number of hit points you regain.

Darkblade.name: Darkblade
Darkblade.fullText:
Drow Wanderer Attack 20Darkblade

You fix your cloud of darkness to the foe you strike, shrouding your enemy in gloom. It remains in place, obscuring your foe’s sight.

Daily        Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature.

Attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 5[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier damage.

Effect: As a free action, use your cloud of darkness power centered on your target instead of you. The power otherwise behaves as normal.

Sustain Minor: The cloud persists, and you can move it 3 squares.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 51.
Darkblade.flavor: You fix your cloud of darkness to the foe you strike, shrouding your enemy in gloom. It remains in place, obscuring your foe’s sight.
Darkblade.attack: Strength vs. AC, Dexterity vs. AC, or Constitution vs. AC
Darkblade.onHit: 5[W] + Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution modifier damage.
Darkblade.effect: As a free action, use your cloud of darkness power centered on your target instead of you. The power otherwise behaves as normal.
Darkblade.sustainMinor: The cloud persists, and you can move it 3 squares.
